alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 9:28AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 1015 AM MST... At 928 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Downtown Peoria and near Glendale, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Peoria, Surprise, El Mirage, Youngtown, Sun City West, Sun City, Glendale Sports Complex, Beardsley, Downtown Peoria, Surprise Stadium, Arrowhead Mall, Downtown Glendale, Camelback Ranch, Lake Pleasant and Vistancia. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 136 and 155. AZ Route 101 between mile markers 6 and 20. AZ Route 74 between mile markers 8 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley
